mapper.select: SELECT tbcrewuser_id as tbcrewuserId FROM( SELECT count(*) as listsize, tbcrewuser_id, content FROM tbcrewushot WHERE tbcrewushot.level = #{level} AND tbcrewushot.content > 0 GROUP BY content ) as tbcrewushot_broup_by_content WHERE tbcrewushot_broup_by_content.listsize = 1

SELECT tbcrewushot.id ,tbcrewushot.deleted ,tbcrewushot.created_at as createdAt ,tbcrewushot.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbcrewushot.tbcrewuser_id as tbcrewuserId ,tbcrewushot.level ,tbcrewushot.content ,tbuser.tbuser_id as tbuserId ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(deleted)', tbuser.username) as tbuserUsername ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(deleted)', tbuser.nick) as tbuserNick ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '', tbuser.mpic) as tbuserMpic FROM tbcrewushot, tbcrewuser, tbuser WHERE tbcrewushot.tbcrewuser_id = tbcrewuser.id AND tbcrewuser.tbuser_id = tbuser.id AND tbcrewushot.id = #{id}
